feat_description: ratio of team1 winning score ratio and team2 winning score ratio
ratio of runs scored in inning1 to runs scored in inning2
ratio of team1 abt avg and team2 bat avg
ratio of aggregate score of team1's top 6 batsman, calculated using career stats of individual batsman with team1/team2
Ratio of team1 to team2 average boundaries to balls bowled
ratio of aggregate score of team1's top 4 bowlers, calculated using career stats of individual bowlers with team1/team2
Ratio of team1's win % to team2's win % in last 5 games
Team1's win percentage against Team2 in last 15 games
Ratio of number of 50s by players in team1 to number of 50s by players in team2 in last 15 games
Toss winner to numerical - 1 if team2 wins, else 0
